location.zh-cn: 美国华盛顿特区哈里·S·杜鲁门大楼
location.en: Harry S. Truman Building, Washington, D.C., United States

description.zh-cn: 美国联邦政府负责外交事务的行政部门，等同于世界各国的“外交部”。
description.en: The federal executive department of the United States responsible for foreign policy and international relations, equivalent to the foreign ministry of other countries.

description.zh-cn: 美国的国家政府，由美国宪法建立，负责管辖美国。
description.en: The national government of the United States, established by the U.S. Constitution, which governs the country.

en: United States Department of Foreign Affairs

description.zh-cn: 美国国务院的前身，是美国第一个联邦外交机构。
description.en: The predecessor to the Department of State, and the first federal foreign affairs agency of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 美国首任总统，签署法案成立了美国外交部。
description.en: The first President of the United States, who signed the legislation to establish the Department of Foreign Affairs.

description.zh-cn: 美国的根本大法，规定美国总统负责外交事务，为国务院的成立提供了法律基础。
description.en: The supreme law of the United States, which stipulates that the President is responsible for foreign affairs, providing the legal basis for the establishment of the Department of State.

description.zh-cn: 美国的国家元首、政府首脑和三军统帅。
description.en: The head of state, head of government, and commander-in-chief of the armed forces of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 美国国务院的行政首长，美国内阁成员，美国总统外交政策的主要顾问。
description.en: The head of the U.S. Department of State, a member of the U.S. Cabinet, and the principal foreign policy advisor to the President of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治人物，现任美国国务卿。
description.en: American politician, current United States Secretary of State.

description.zh-cn: 美国开国元勋，首任美国国务卿。
description.en: An American Founding Father and the first U.S. Secretary of State.

en: United States Deputy Secretary of State

description.zh-cn: 美国国务院中级别第二高的官员。
description.en: The second-highest-ranking official in the U.S. Department of State.

description.zh-cn: 美国外交官，现任美国副国务卿。
description.en: American diplomat, current United States Deputy Secretary of State.

en: Under Secretary of State for Political Affairs

description.zh-cn: 美国国务院第三重量级官员，是国务卿与副国务卿缺席或有事时之代理人。
description.en: The third-ranking official in the U.S. Department of State, who serves as the acting Secretary in the absence of the Secretary and Deputy Secretary.

nodes.id: 美国国务院东亚暨太平洋事务局

zh-cn: 美国国务院东亚暨太平洋事务局
en: Bureau of East Asian and Pacific Affairs

description.zh-cn: 美国国务院下属机构，隶属于美国国务院政务次卿，负责处理美国对东亚和太平洋地区国家的外交事务。
description.en: A bureau within the U.S. Department of State, subordinate to the Under Secretary of State for Political Affairs, responsible for U.S. foreign policy towards countries in the East Asia and Pacific region.

nodes.id: 美国国务院军备控制与国际安全事务次卿

zh-cn: 美国国务院军备控制与国际安全事务次卿
军控与国际安全事务次卿
en: Under Secretary of State for Arms Control and International Security Affairs

description.zh-cn: 美国国务院高级官员，负责向国务卿和副国务卿提供军备控制、防扩散和裁军方面的建议。
description.en: A senior official in the U.S. Department of State who serves as the principal adviser to the Secretary of State and the Deputy Secretary of State on arms control, nonproliferation, and disarmament.

description.zh-cn: 美国国务院是美国联邦政府负责外交事务的行政部门。
description.en: The Department of State is an executive department of the U.S. federal government responsible for foreign affairs.

description.zh-cn: 美国外交部于1789年9月15日更名为美国国务院，成为其前身。
description.en: The Department of Foreign Affairs was renamed the Department of State on September 15, 1789, becoming its predecessor.

description.zh-cn: 作为美国总统，签署法案批准成立美国外交部。
description.en: As President of the United States, signed the bill that established the Department of Foreign Affairs.

description.zh-cn: 美国宪法规定美国总统负责处理国家的外交事务。
description.en: The U.S. Constitution stipulates that the President of the United States is responsible for handling the nation's foreign affairs.

description.zh-cn: 美国国务卿是美国总统外交政策的主要顾问，直接对总统负责。
description.en: The Secretary of State is the principal foreign policy advisor to the President of the United States and reports directly to the President.

description.zh-cn: 担任美国国务卿，是国务院的行政首长。
description.en: Serves as the United States Secretary of State, the head of the Department of State.

description.zh-cn: 担任首任美国国务卿。
description.en: Served as the first United States Secretary of State.

description.zh-cn: 担任美国副国务卿。
description.en: Serves as the United States Deputy Secretary of State.

description.zh-cn: 美国副国务卿是美国国务院中次于国务卿的官员。
description.en: The Deputy Secretary of State is the official second in rank to the Secretary of State in the U.S. Department of State.

description.zh-cn: 美国国务院政务次卿是国务院的第三重量级官员，直接向副国务卿汇报工作，并在国务卿和副国务卿缺席时担任代理国务卿。
description.en: The Under Secretary of State for Political Affairs is the third-ranking official in the Department of State, reports directly to the Deputy Secretary, and serves as Acting Secretary in their absence.

relationships.source: 美国国务院东亚暨太平洋事务局

description.zh-cn: 东亚暨太平洋事务局是隶属于政务次卿的机构。
description.en: The Bureau of East Asian and Pacific Affairs is an agency subordinate to the Under Secretary of State for Political Affairs.

relationships.source: 美国国务院军备控制与国际安全事务次卿

description.zh-cn: 军控与国际安全事务次卿是国务院高级官员，向国务卿提供专业建议。
description.en: The Under Secretary of State for Arms Control and International Security Affairs is a senior official who provides professional advice to the Secretary of State.
